activities:
TeamSupport creates and sells customer support software.  We use cookies to track users who visit our marketing website and will also request additional identifying information when marketing collateral is downloaded.  This information included name, company name, and potentially additional contact information.

When a customer purchases a subscription to TeamSupport, we collect additional data including billing information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Visitor information is collected automatically via our marketing automation software.  Billing information may be collected automatically through a secure form or manually processed over the phone or a fax.
